security_hardening.title: Implement Secrets Detection Pre-commit Hook
security_hardening.description: Add gitleaks or detect-secrets to the pre-commit configuration to prevent accidental commits of API keys or tokens.
security_hardening.rationale: Accidental secret exposure is a major security risk. Automated detection at the commit stage provides a critical line of defense.

security_hardening.title: Implement API Rate Limiting
security_hardening.description: Add rate limiting middleware to all FastAPI services to prevent DDoS attacks and brute-force attempts.
security_hardening.rationale: Rate limiting is a standard security practice for production APIs to ensure availability and protect against abuse.

security_hardening.title: Enable Audit Logging for Policy Evaluations
security_hardening.description: Implement structured audit logs for every policy validation request, capturing user ID, resources, and decisions.
security_hardening.rationale: Traceability is essential for regulatory compliance and incident investigation in a governance system.
